title: SUSPENDED CEILINGS
fullText:
Luminaires that are supported by a ceiling panel shall notâ€”
(a)	present a mechanical loading that exceeds the capacity of the ceiling panel; and
(b)	operate at a temperature that would cause deformation, discolouration or other forms of deterioration of the ceiling panel.
NOTE: AS/NZS 2785 states that rigid infill panels or independent supports may be required for some panels. Refer to manufacturer's information for limitations on particular ceiling systems.
